'''''Parma Eldalamberon 10''''' is the tenth issue of ''[[Parma Eldalamberon]]'', a journal of linguistic studies of the Elvish languages and names in the works of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{PEnav|9|11}}

==Contents==
* Cover: "The Death of Glorfindel" — Patrick H. Wynne
* From the Editor

* Articles
** "A Glossary of the Minor Languages in 'The Etymologies'" — [[Taum Santoski]]
** "Introduction to the Ilkorin Dialects" — Lisa Star
** "The Quenya Case System in the Later Writings of J.R.R. Tolkien" — Patrick H. Wynne

* Art: "[[:File:Parma Eldalamberon 10 page 8.png|The Ring of Barahir]]" — Leonid Korablev
* Runes: Letters to ''Parma''
* Back cover: "[[:File:Parma Eldalamberon 10 (back cover).png|Nuin, Father of Speech]]" — [[Tom Loback]]

==External links==
* [http://www.eldalamberon.com/parma10.html Official product] on Eldalamberon.com (currently unavailable)
